content: sts or go up half a hook size https //www youtube com/watch v=2hqktwihwvc 12 tu t ori als cluster stitches two treble_crochet cluster 2trc-cluster yo twice insert hook into indicated stitch and pull up a loop 4 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops twice 2 loops on the hook yo twice insert hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop 5 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops twice 3 loops on the hook yo pull through all 3 loops 13 tu t ori als cluster stitches three treble_crochet cluster 3trc-cluster yo twice insert hook into indicated stitch and pull up a loop 4 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops twice 2 loops on the hook yo twice insert hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop 5 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops twice 3 loops on the hook yo twice insert hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop 6 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops twice 4 loops on the hook yo pull through all 4 loops 14 15 ab b revi ati on s blo back loops only please see tutorial on how to do this chain chain double_crochet double_crochet dc3to g double_crochet three please see tutorial on how to do this together half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet skip st/ sts skip a stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch space/sps space/spaces st/sts stitch/stitches surface slip_stitch surface slip_stitch please see tutorial on how to do this yo yarn over 2dc-cluster two double_crochet please see tutorial on how to do this cluster 3dc-c l three double_crochet please see tutorial on how to do this cluster 2trc-cluster two treble_crochet please see tutorial on how to do this cluster 3trc-cluster three treble_crochet please see tutorial on how to do this cluster 16 to beg in ch4 join to the beginning chain with a slip_stitch to form a ring or use a magic_ring round 1 ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 11hdc into the ring join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 12hdc roun d 2 join in any st ch3 2trc-cluster in the same st this counts as the 1st 3trc-cluster ch2 3trc-cluster in the next st ch2 11 times join to the top of the beginning 3trc-cluster with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends i wou ld recommend securing ends only after you have completed working round 3 you may pick up some cupping and it will be easier to frog if ends are not secured stitch count 12 3trc-cluster 12 ch2-spaces 17 note if you find your work cupping after working round 3 work a 3dc-cluster instead of the 3trc-cluster for round 2 roun d 3 join in any ch2-space ch1 this does not count as a st 3sc in the same space 3sc in the next ch2-space 11 times join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure
